2.Pros: The only pros working for this McDonalds is that you have to be really dumb or really lazy to be fired. Scheduals are flexable.

4.Pros: -Free meals (depends on owner)-Great experience for resume (lot's of talking points)
4.Cons: -General Managers burn out fast and change frequently-"Lifers" can become annoying if they are bad/mean individuals-If you aren't making the schedules your shifts are likely prone to be short individuals making the shift an experience from hell

5.Cons: Long hours, very busy all the time

6.Pros: Eligible for Annual Bonuses, Sabbatical, Vacation Time

7.Pros: Fast pace, nice customers, nice coworkers

8.Pros: Working at the McDoanld's in Park city was an excellent experience while still attending high school. They were very flexible with the schedule and everyone was very friendly.
8.Cons: Didn't like the fact that they changed the employee lunch menu; one used to be able to order any meal on the menu. Now they limited the menu to cheaper burgers like mcchicken etc.. Also, after you are done working you will feel very greasy.

9.Cons: No organization over worked no consistency
